DOC.brief_summary: Active vitamin D therapeutic dose may prevent vascular calcification supraphysiologic dose may precipitate .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Alfacalcidol Coronary Artery Calcification Predialysis Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Active vitamin D compound use frequently treatment hyperparathyroidism chronic kidney disease . Recent evidence animal study suggest low dose active vitamin D may protective vascular calcification , whereas high dose could precipitate . The present study examine effect low dose oral alfacalcidol coronary artery calcification predialysis chronic kidney disease patient hyperparathyroidism .
DOC.criteria: Predialysis chronic kidney disease GFR < 90 mL/min/1.73m2 PTH upper limit normal serum calcium phosphate upper limit normal change GFR > 15 % past 3 month receive elemental calcium > 500 mg/day currently take active vitamin D , oral calcium elemental calcium > 500 mg/day bisphosphonate
